channel.title: Elec on Justin MK Lam | Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Elec on Justin MK Lam | Portfolio

item.title: Battery Power Protection and Regulation PCB
item.description: Objective: Design a custom PCB to protect and regulate a 14.8V LiPo battery for use with an autonomous RC car Features: 12V undervoltage and 10A overcurrent protection 8.4V, 7.4V, and 5V regulated outputs Main Components: LT6109 High Side Current Sense Amplifier RT8288AZSP Synchronous Step-Down Converter Skills: Reading and understanding datasheets Schematic capture and PCB layout in Altium Designer Board bring-up Hardware debugging Achievement Unlocked:
